trans-unit.source: Creates and deletes Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 virtual roots.
trans-unit.target: 建立及刪除網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6.0 虛擬根目錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface defines methods for creating and deleting virtual roots in IIS 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>介面會定義用於建立和刪除 IIS 6.0 中的虛擬根目錄的方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented only by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> class and is used only within the .NET Framework infrastructure while creating a SOAP-enabled COM+ application virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面只藉由實作<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot>類別，並僅用於.NET Framework 基礎結構時建立的 SOAP 啟用 COM + 應用程式虛擬根目錄。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> 不需要直接在您的程式碼中實作。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class, which implements the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface that contains the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>類別，它會實作<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>介面，其中包含<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>和<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>未完全實作<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> 為.NET framework 內部使用。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要在您的程式碼中直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string with the value <c>"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"</c> representing the root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 字串，具有表示根網頁伺服器的值 <c>"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"</c>。

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root, which corresponds to <c>PhysicalPath</c> from the <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬根目錄的實體路徑，對應 <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)" /> 方法中的 <c>PhysicalPath</c>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root, which corresponds to <c>VirtualRoot</c> from <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬根目錄的名稱，對應 <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)" /> 中的 <c>VirtualRoot</c>。

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 可以用來寫入錯誤訊息的字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 建立網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 虛擬根目錄。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot.Create%2A> method from your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要呼叫<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot.Create%2A>從您的程式碼的方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The root Web server, as specified by <c>RootWebServer</c> from the <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 根網頁伺服器，由 <see cref="M:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot(System.String,System.String,System.String@)" /> 方法中的 <c>RootWebServer</c> 指定。

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬根目錄的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬根目錄的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 可以用來寫入錯誤訊息的字串。

trans-unit.source: Deletes an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 刪除網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 虛擬根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Even though it is public, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot.Delete%2A> method is not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 即使它是公用的<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot.Delete%2A>方法不適合直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, there is the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 另外，還有<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, this method is not fully implemented.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這個方法未完全實作。
